1.title: JB SQUARE Opens New Bio-Incubation Center
1.description: A new state-of-the-art facility is now open to support early-stage biotech startups with labs and mentoring programs.

2.title: Regulatory Fast-Track Program for Medical Devices Announced
2.description: New guidelines released to accelerate the approval process for innovative medical technologies.

3.title: Jeonbuk Bio-Industry Investment Briefing - Q4 2025
3.description: Join us for an online briefing on investment trends and opportunities in the Jeonbuk bio sector.

4.title: Call for 'Bio-Future' Tech Program Participants
4.description: We are recruiting promising companies for our intensive technology commercialization support program.

5.title: Bio-Venture Incubation Space Now Available
5.description: Applications are open for startups seeking fully-equipped lab and office space in our new wing.

6.title: Green Bio Grants for Sustainable Tech
6.description: Government grants available for companies developing eco-friendly biotechnology solutions.

7.title: Global Partnership Agreement with Bio-Cluster Germany
7.description: JB SQUARE signs an MOU with Germany's leading bio-cluster to foster international collaboration.

8.title: Commercialization Support for University Spin-offs
8.description: A new program to help university-based research projects transition into viable businesses.

9.title: Recruitment Fair for Bio-Industry Talent
9.description: Connect with top graduates and experienced professionals at our annual recruitment event.

1.name: BioGenix Korea
1.description: Leading the charge in developing next-generation biopharmaceuticals for rare diseases.

2.name: MedTech Solutions
2.description: Innovating smart diagnostic tools and medical devices for point-of-care applications.

3.name: GenomeLink
3.description: Personalized medicine through advanced genomic sequencing and data analysis.

4.name: AgriNova
4.description: Developing sustainable agricultural solutions using biotechnology to improve crop yields.

5.name: QuantumLeap AI
5.description: AI-powered drug discovery platform accelerating the research pipeline.

6.name: Cellular Dynamics Inc.
6.description: Pioneering cell therapy manufacturing and research for regenerative medicine.

7.name: NutriBiome
7.description: Functional foods and microbiome-based products for improved health and wellness.

8.name: EcoPlastics
8.description: Creating biodegradable polymers and sustainable materials from biological sources.

9.name: AquaPure Systems
9.description: Bio-filtration and environmental remediation technologies for water purification.

1.name: Jeonbuk Bio-Convergence Industry Promotion Agency (JIF)
1.description: Comprehensive support for bio companies, from R&D to commercialization and marketing.

2.name: Korea Agricultural Technology Promotion Agency (FACT)
2.description: Specialized support for agricultural technology ventures and smart farm startups.

3.name: Korea Research Institute of Bioscience and Biotechnology (KRIBB) Jeonbuk Branch
3.description: National research institute leading cutting-edge research in genomics and biotechnology.

4.name: Korea Institute of Toxicology (KIT) Jeonbuk Branch
4.description: Provides non-clinical testing services and safety evaluations for new drug candidates.

5.name: Jeonbuk National University (JBNU)
5.description: A leading university fostering top talent and conducting foundational research in life sciences.

6.name: Wonkwang University (WKU)
6.description: Known for its strong programs in medicine, pharmacy, and medical technology.

8.name: Advanced Radiation Technology Institute (ARTI), KAERI
8.description: Specializes in radiation fusion technology for medical and biotechnological applications.

9.name: Jeonju University
9.description: Focuses on food science and functional food development programs.

10.name: Jeonbuk Technopark
10.description: A hub for regional technology innovation, providing incubation and business support.

11.name: Carbon Composite Materials Research Institute, KRICT
11.description: Research on advanced biomaterials and carbon-based applications for the medical field.

12.name: Kunsan National University
12.description: Strong programs in marine biotechnology and agricultural sciences.

13.name: Korea Electronics Technology Institute (KETI) Jeonbuk Headquarters
13.description: Supports the convergence of IT and BT, focusing on smart health devices and sensors.

14.name: Korea Institute of Industrial Technology (KITECH) Jeonbuk Headquarters
14.description: Provides support for process technology and manufacturing innovation for bio-companies.

1.title: Corporate & Local Tax Holiday
1.desc: Full exemption on corporate/income tax for 5 years, followed by a 50% reduction for 2 years for investments in Saemangeum.

2.title: Large-Scale Cash Grants
2.desc: Receive direct cash support up to KRW 10-20 billion from provincial and city governments for large investments.

3.title: Hiring & Training Subsidies
3.desc: Up to KRW 1.5 million per employee for hiring and KRW 1 million for training when hiring over 20 local residents.

4.title: Land & Site Support
4.desc: Up to 100% reduction on rent for industrial sites in Foreign Investment Zones (FIZ) for up to 100 years.
